full_summary:
# EZ899-231881A – Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Geomatics Survey Services #

**Overview**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Government of Canada, invites qualified survey firms to submit offers for a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Geomatics Survey Services. The RFSO is subject to amendment 3, issued on June 22, 2023, and was published on May 16, 2023.

**Key Details**
* **Notice Number:** WS4011882141
* **Publication Date:** May 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 27, 2023, at 2:00 PM Eastern Time
* **Contract Start Date:** September 1, 2023
* **Contract End Date:** August 31, 2026
* **Estimated Contract Value:** $850,000.00 (Applicable Taxes excluded)

**Scope of Services**
The selected Standing Offer will provide a range of geomatics survey services for land survey and engineering surveying projects in British Columbia and the Yukon Territory. Offerors must be licensed or eligible to be licensed to practice in both provinces. The firm and its personnel will be evaluated on the basis of their demonstrated understanding of the scope of services, approach, methodology, relevant experience, and cost of the provision of services.

**Procurement Approach**
This is a competitive open-bidding procurement with a selection criterion of the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price. The Government of Canada intends to authorize up to two (2) Standing Offers, each for a period of three (3) years plus two (2) one-year optional years. 

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), among others.

**Contact Information**
For any questions or inquiries, please contact:
Summer Wong, PSPC
Email: [summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:summer.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
